For newbies the difference between Cheating,NTR and Netori, if the person being cucked is present in the story its NTR/Netori, if he/she is not then its just a cheating and the difference between NTR and Netori, NTR is mostly a forced, raped, cucked while Netori is cheating, cucked,  interchangeable but their is still a subtle difference which is the person doing the cheating on her/his own free will, willing/choosing the person who he/she cheating with to fuck = Netori while NTR is forced/rape, coerced.
